attributes.action: Continue with the plans to build the £100 million community mosque, and integrate education and understanding of faith programme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More than 48,000 people petitioned Government to“abolish plans for the £100m mega-mosque”  

Long before the demonisation of mosques as a breeding ground for men with 'hooks' for hands spreading terrorism,Mosques have been integral to the development of community,raising aspirations,literacy,equality & understanding,supporting rights of women,a ground for mediation in times of conflict. 

Let us not isolate any faith group, instead let us support the freedom to practice faith,promote liberation & rights found within education,& enable light to be spread through tolerance & through greater understanding. 

To abolish plans to build a community hub due to its worth (£100 million-raised through donations seems nonsensical) A community hub,which promotes education,& social welfare,be it a temple, church, gurudwara, synagogue,self-help group,youth club, women’s refuge etc surely is worth its weight in gold. The mosque is a community hub not just for Muslims; this petition is a petition not just for Muslims.  

There has been a petition protesting against the £100 million community mosque, let us give the rest of the community the opportunity to respond.
